mapper.select: select id, channel, category, prod_id, prod_name, price, discount_price, discount, mer_name, detail_link, recommend_reason, prod_pic, create_time from product where id = #{id}
select id, channel, category, prod_id, prod_name, price, discount_price, discount, mer_name, detail_link, recommend_reason, prod_pic, create_time from product order by create_time
select count(1) from product where channel = #{channel} and category = #{category}
select category,count(category) count from product where channel =#{channel} GROUP BY category order by count desc

select id, channel, category, prod_id, prod_name, price, discount_price, discount, mer_name, detail_link, recommend_reason, prod_pic, create_time from product order by create_time LIMIT #{begin},#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into product (channel, category, prod_id, prod_name, price, discount_price, discount, mer_name, recommend_reason, prod_pic, create_time) values (#{channel}, #{category}, #{prodId}, #{prodName}, #{price}, #{discountPrice}, #{discount}, #{merName}, #{detailLink}, #{recommendReason}, #{prodPic}, #{createTime})
